data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=s3u25pu8GQ8Q7kNvgFj8W6B&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDXpthw9i3CszOJ7-nn8a188AcsHq5m0X0QtFI8_lsamQ&oe=66546CB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=k_09-O0xjr8Q7kNvgEmUwzL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDYxrvagyuQJdVYxT7GmV46Jmqs_WRJvJL6UU85jG0MVw&oe=66547A52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Pxx67s5kHd4Q7kNvgG5QwyR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCFinO8_IkFSq1BZbkyIk8nnCLGvb0aZHf5-8aZyaIcmQ&oe=66547DD0)
